apiKey.checkEmail: Check your email for your API key
apiKey.tokenExpiredMessage: This verification token has expired. Please request a new API key.
apiKey.apiKeySent: Your API key has been generated and sent to your email
apiKey.saveApiKey: Please save this API key securely. You will need it to access the API. We've also sent it to your email for safekeeping.
apiKey.howToUse: How to use your API key:
apiKey.includeHeader: Include your API key in the
apiKey.serverErrorMessage: We're sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.

email.verifyEmailSubject: Verify your email for Brandmeister Lastheard API
email.verifyEmailBody: Thank you for requesting an API key for the Brandmeister Lastheard Next Generation API. To complete your registration and receive your API key, please verify your email address by clicking the button below:
email.buttonNotWork: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.linkExpires: This link will expire in 24 hours.
email.didNotRequest: If you did not request an API key, please ignore this email.
email.emailVerifiedSuccess: Your email has been verified successfully! Here is your API key for accessing the Brandmeister Lastheard Next Generation API:
email.keepSafe: Please keep this API key safe and do not share it with others. You will receive reminder emails before expiration.
email.howToUseTitle: How to Use Your API Key
email.includeKeyInHeader: Include your API key in the
email.questionsContact: If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team.
email.automatedEmail: This is an automated email. Please do not reply.
email.expiryReminderSubject: Your Brandmeister API Key Expires in {{days}} Days
email.expiryReminder: This is a friendly reminder that your Brandmeister Lastheard API key will expire in
email.whatToDoBody: To continue using the Brandmeister Lastheard API after the expiration date, you will need to request a new API key.
email.tipMessage: Request your new API key before the expiration date to avoid any service interruption.
email.anyQuestions: If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.
email.passwordResetBody: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password:
email.resetLinkExpires: This link will expire in 48 hours.
email.didNotRequestReset: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.
email.emailChangeBodyOld: We received a request to change the email address associated with your account. To proceed, please verify your current email address by clicking the button below:
email.emailChangeBodyNew: This is the final step to complete your email change. Please verify your new email address by clicking the button below:
email.didNotRequestChange: If you did not request this email change, please ignore this email or contact support if you have concerns.

user.name: Name
user.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
user.registrationBenefits: Registered users get access to advanced search functions, including callsign search with wildcards, specific talkgroup selection, and detailed activity statistics.

user.alreadyVerifiedMessage: This account has already been verified.
user.tokenExpiredMessage: This verification token has expired. Please register again.
user.accountVerifiedMessage: Your account has been verified successfully. You can now log in and access advanced features.
user.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
user.advancedFunctionsPromo: Advanced search and statistics are available to registered users.
user.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your callsign and email to reset your password
user.resetFailed: Password reset failed. Please try again.
user.oldEmailVerifiedMessage: We've sent a verification link to your new email address. Please check your inbox to complete the email change.
user.emailChangeAlreadyVerified: This step has already been completed.
user.emailChangeCompleted: Your email change has already been completed.
user.emailChangedMessage: Your email address has been updated successfully.
user.invalidOrExpiredToken: The verification token is invalid or has expired. Please try again.
